lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Jan. 2 (U.P.) -- The spokesman of the National Military Council said today that only the Japanese drive against Changsha was a major attack of the dozen pushes intended to divert the Chinese from aiding the Allies.
abstract: Chungking New China Daily News warns Govt not to neglect China defenses by sending troops out of country
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Jan. 2 (U.P.) -- The spokesman of the National Military Council said today that only the Japanese drive against Changsha was a major attack of the dozen pushes intended to divert the Chinese from aiding the Allies....
